channel.title: Change Report Card Grades
channel.description:
This is a report i got last semester (ya i know its bad).. and i need someone to change some of the grades so i can give o my parents this semester.
Grades I want
1. D+ 2. C 3. B- 4. E 5. C+ 6. B
GPA - 1.8
Absences and Tardies
1. 9 , 12 2. 6 , 1 3. 3 , 0 4. 3 , 2 5. 3, 0 6. 3, 3
Notes under each class that the teacher wrote that i would like to be gone.
1. Take out "Student in Danger of Failing" 2. Leave Same 3. Leave Same 4. Take out "Student in Danger of Failing" and "Needs to Report to Class Prepared" 5. Leave Same 6. Leave Same
Here it is - http://gamerz-elite.com/Edit.bmp
I covered up my name and school address and stuff.... but if u know u can do this and touch it up so u cant see the wrinkles in the paper and stuff.. then post here and ill giv u the link to the image with the address and my name... or add my msn - gtech@gamerz-elite.com

item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

aw man. Flair beat me to it. This looks like fun, considering I had to forge all of my progress reports with actual pen/sharpie. And believe me, thats a bitch.
Anyways, good luck on this.
I got caught because my parents called my teachers to ask if my homework was still coming along well …ended up in a bit of a pickle.

item.title: Change Report Card Grades
item.dc:creator: @Gtech_Warriors Gtech Warriors
item.description:
@Gtech_Warriors wrote:

Looks good except…

If u can i need the wrinkles and stuff taken off the paper and make it the background pure white…

Change the date to - 05/07/06

The GPA (like u said)

Make paper size, so i can print

and

Absences and Tardies

  1. 9 , 12
  2. 6 , 1
  3. 3 , 0
  4. 3 , 2
  5. 3, 0
  6. 3, 3

Notes under each class that the teacher wrote that i would like to be gone.

  1. Take out “Student in Danger of Failing”
  2. Leave Same
  3. Leave Same
  4. Take out “Student in Danger of Failing” and “Needs to Report to Class Prepared”
  5. Leave Same
  6. Leave Same

and THANKS!

Uploaded it here also - http://hyperupload.com/download/023b6b7240/Edit.bmp.html

I think the text is - Courier New but not positive…
